tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE adverse_event_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(255),
  patient_name VARCHAR(255),
  report_date DATE,
  adverse_event_description TEXT,
  severity_level INT,
  compliance_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE AdverseEvents (
  report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(255),
  event_type VARCHAR(100),
  event_date DATE,
  reporter_name VARCHAR(150),
  severity VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Products (
  product_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(255),
  manufacturer VARCHAR(200),
  dosage_strength VARCHAR(50),
  dosage_form VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE Reporters (
  reporter_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  reporter_name VARCHAR(150),
  organization VARCHAR(200),
  contact_email VARCHAR(100),
  phone_number VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE ComplianceStatus (
  status_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  report_id UUID REFERENCES AdverseEvents(report_id),
  compliance_level VARCHAR(50),
  last_checked DATE
)

CREATE TABLE adverse_event_reports (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    event_description TEXT,
    reported_date DATE,
    reporter_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(100),
    manufacturer_name VARCHAR(100),
    product_type VARCHAR(50),
    dosage_form VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE reporters (
    reporter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    reporter_name VARCHAR(50),
    contact_email VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE adverse_event_categories (
    category_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    category_name VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE event_status (
    status_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    status_name VARCHAR(50)
)
